name: .STR File Extension
summary: Learn about .STR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An STR file defines the structure of a database (.DBF file) created by dBASE, a database management application. It contains a text-based list of all the objects in the database file, including the number of fields, names of each field, and specifications (width and height) of each database field. dBASE uses STR files to create printed archive index tables and document the structure of each table.

content: dBASE is a Windows application that provides various features for managing databases, developing programs, and compiling them. The tool supports many modern database engines, including SQL Server, Access, and MySQL.

instructions: You can open STR files with dBASE in Windows. Since STR files store plain text, you can also open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (Mac).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
